import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{getAccountDetails,getClientApps}from'../backend/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState({email:'',name:'',id:null});const[clientApps,setClientApps]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{getAccountDetails().then(data=>{setUser({email:data.data.email,name:data.data.username});}).catch(error=>{console.error('Errore nel recupero dei dettagli dell\'account:',error);navigate('/account/login');});// Recupero app clienti dal DB
